def.dt: :a person who has written something The author of the article didn't check his facts.
:a person who has written a book or who writes many books I enjoyed the book, but I can't remember the name of the/its author. a best-selling author [=writer]
:a person who starts or creates something (such as a plan or idea) She is the author of a plan for reforming the school system.
:to be the author of (something, such as a book) He has authored [=written] several best-selling novels. She authored [=wrote] several articles for the magazine.
